question: How do we join the club? Is there any procedure?
answer: Everyone is welcome to join the club! Join the discord server to stay up to date with all the upcoming meetings of all division and also find resources for past meetings.

question: Will there be offline sessions?
answer: At the moment, all our sessions are online till the college moves to normal schedule following which offline meets will be held.

question: Can we join more than one domain?
answer: Yes you can! Try out all the domains, find which ones you like the best and join the sessions!
